body: Hello Avicus members and staff, my name is MonkeyManFilms1. I am here to introduce myself to the Avicus network. I recently have started playing a lot of Avicus and I was to myself, I should join the community. And starting your first post is to introduce yourself. So here I am. I do have a youtube. It's not big but here it is https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCjZbZEbFTywErQ6UUBHfaNg. I decided that I will start recording Nebula games on Avicus. I usually do hunger games but I needed to play something else. So soon I'll record some games on Avicus. I used to play a little of Avicus but not much. I do though go on Plug Dj and jam on the avicus dj. But really, I came back to Avicus. I will start playing here a lot. If you see me, say hi! I am very friendly. So after this, I'm gonna go play some Nebula. Well, this is my introduction. Say Hi if you see me!
